member.summary: Reference to the srp server object that handles calculation logic related to the SRP protocol server part.

member.summary: Reference to the database context.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Controllers.SrpProtocolController.GetSaltAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Action that gets invoked when the user requests the salt for a given user name.
member.returns: The salt for this particular user if successful. Otherwise a bad request result.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Controllers.SrpProtocolController.GenerateProofAsync(SRPShared.SrpProofModel)
member.summary: This method posts the client generated proof to the server in order to validate that both client and server have got the correct key.
member.returns: The server proof, however only if the client proof was able to be verified.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Controllers.SrpProtocolController.CompleteRegistrationAsync(SRPShared.SrpRegistrationModel)
member.summary: Completes registration for a given user, persisting a user record in the database.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Controllers.SrpProtocolController.PostClientGeneratedValue(SRPShared.SrpAuthenticationModel)
member.summary: Posts the client login information containing username and generated client public value to the server. On receiving the values, the server calculates its own pair of ephemeral values, and proceeds to return the public value back to the client.
member.param: Login model containing client generated value A, as well as username.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Controllers.SrpProtocolController.GetAnswer(SRPShared.SrpMessageModel)
member.summary: Posts an encrypted message from the client to the server. This method is used for testing and makes the server accept input in the format xxx:xxxx and sends back anything that comes after the colon.

member.summary: Retrieves the client generated value A as part of the login process.
member.param: The client verifier used as a key.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Helpers.DataCache.StoreClientGeneratedValue(System.Numerics.BigInteger,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Stores the public value A that was sent to the server by the client.
member.param: The dictionary key. This is the client verifier.
member.exception: Is thrown if either client key or client value are null.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Helpers.DataCache.CreateUserRecord(System.Numerics.BigInteger,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a user record locally on the server in memory.
member.param: The client key for the dictionary.
The value generated by the client.
member.exception: Thrown if either of the parameters are null.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Helpers.DataCache.RetrieveServerPublicValue(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Retrieves the generated public server value for a client.
member.returns: The values for this clients session.
member.exception: Is thrown if client key is null.

member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample02_SRP.Helpers.DataCache.RetrieveServerPrivateValue(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Retrieves the generated private server value for a given client..
member.returns: The values for this clients session.
member.exception: Is thrown if client key is null.

member.param: The client verifier used as a dictionary key.
